name: Doppel Chaser
description:
This was a game made for the vampire game jam. This game jam helped me learn how to make cutscenes and smarter AI. There was more I wanted to include but due to inexperience and over scoping I had to redo the story to fit around what I had. 

Plot: 

Vamp is a vampire who works as a nocturnal cave explorer searching for treasure with his pet bat Fang. 

Vamp was exploring some caves until he comes across a mystic mirror. 

The mirror mysteriously shatters and a doppelganger of the explorer now tries to escape the caves. 

The explorer chases the doppelganger to a dead end where he must shatter his doppelganger before they escape. 

Features: 

A boss fight against an intelligent AI

A practice room to get a handle on how Vamp works before jumping in. 

Gameplay:

Controls:

Left stick and D pad - Movement

Right stick - Secondary Weapon swap

L bumper - Dash

R bumper - Secondary Shot

North Face button - Secondary shot

East Face button - Dash

South Face button - Jump

West Face button - Primary Shot

Pause button - Pause

Mechanics:

Primary shots: Heal the player on contact with the opponent

Secondary shoots: Drain health from the player when used

Health buddy: Turns blue when the player's health is above 50% and red when below 50%

Other:

Any feedback would be appreciated.
